mapper.insert: insert into adm_leave_form (employee_id, form_type, start_time, end_time, reason, create_time, state) values (#{employeeId},#{formType},#{startTime},#{endTime},#{reason},#{createTime},#{state});
mapper.select: select lf.*, e.name, d.* from adm_leave_form lf, adm_process_flow pf, adm_employee e, adm_department d where lf.form_id = pf.form_id and lf.employee_id = e.employee_id and e.department_id = d.dept_id and pf.state = 'process' and pf.operator_id = #{pf_operator_id}
